12. WATER SUPPLY

There did you get water for drinking and for cooking? (well, river, slough, dugout) Rain, river, well on edge of school.

How far was this water from your home? 1/4 mile.

How was it brought to the home? (pail, barrel, tank) Barrel.

Regarding water supply, mention any changes which have taken place since you first started housekeeping, giving dates where possible.

Muddy rain water for drinking in summer from 1918 to 1930 - since then snow in winter & ice or snow in ice well in summer - River in unfit - both summer & winter - wells are alkaline or otherwise unfit.
12. WATER SUPPLY

Flag and line water supply, mention any changes which have taken place since you first started homesteading, giving dates where possible.

May 1930 - Since then - Summer in well - Winter in well - Both in the well in summer - Wells are shallow or otherwise unfit.
